document.full_text: alberto contador faces another hurdle in his bid to clear his name of doping allegations after the world anti-doping agency (wada) said on tuesday it was joining the appeal against the decision to absolve him.
document.title: w.a.d.a. appeals to cas in contador case
lines_and_colors: alberto contador faces another hurdle in his bid to clear his name of doping allegations after the world anti-doping agency (wada) said on tuesday it was joining the appeal against the decision to absolve him.
